description: Adds metadata tags to a DataBrew resource, such as a dataset, project, recipe, job, or schedule.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The DataBrew resource to which tags should be added. The value for this parameter is an Amazon Resource Name (ARN). For DataBrew, you can tag a dataset, a job, a project, or a recipe.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: One or more tags to be assigned to the resource. (string) --- (string) ---
